TEXT.name: TEXT
TEXT.value: Smile to shine the sun on our plants

TEXT.name: TEXT
TEXT.value: Bugs want to eat our plants!

TEXT.name: TEXT
TEXT.value: Tap a plant to guess where the bugs are!

TEXT.name: TEXT
TEXT.value: Tap a plant to water it

TEXT.name: TEXT
TEXT.value: Hooray! We harvested all the plants!
